gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFund return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
